name: Sky Hotel
address: DT20, Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park, Son Trach Commune, Quang Binh Province, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Sky Hotel tọa lạc ở Phong Nha và có phòng chờ chung. Tại đây có sân hiên và khách có thể sử dụng Wi-Fi miễn phí và chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí.

Tại khách sạn, mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, TV màn hình phẳng, phòng tắm riêng, ga trải giường, khăn tắm và ban công với view núi. Phòng khách có tủ quần áo.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Sky Hotel 38 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: chủ nhà nhiệt tình dễ gần

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: The host was so friendly!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: everything, host was amazing. arrived early and they were very accommodating. room was very nice clean and spacious. highly recommend

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff is very enthusiastic and friendly, the room is clean and fully equipped, I will come back and recommend to friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 3 nights, the place was really clean. The host was super friendly and accomodating, they even let us have a late shower and check out at 8pm before our night bus and helped sort out all of our tours during our stay. 
They provided us a really nice breakfast in the morning always at a time that worked with our tour. Would recommend!

review.rating: wonderful stay and would definitely comeback and recommend to family and friends
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotel was centrally located, very clean and provided basic towels and toiletries.The place is with in walking distance to the ticket booth for Phong Nha cave boat ride. The host, Ms. Thuy is very welcoming and her husband provided us with transportation to the paradise cave about 25 km away and waited for us to complete our tour to take us back to the hotel and transport us to Đồng Hới airport. 
We would definitely comedy to this place and recommend to our family and friends.

review.rating: Great hosts, nice room and excellent location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: It has a great location. 10 mins leisure walk to Phong Nha caves office. What I really liked was the hosts. They were lovely and warm people. I was bit lost when I reached Phong Nha and couldn't find my way. They came to pick me up. I wasn't far from their place. They even offered me noodle soup breakfast for no charge. More than the room, I liked the hospitality of the hosts. The room was big and comfortable and reasonably priced. An absolute value for money.
review.comment_negative: As far as I remember, there were no electrical plugs in toilet. As I use an electrical trimmer for my beard, I couldn't plug it in to a power source. That needs to be there. This was the only thing missing in my overall stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Le personnel était très sympathique et serviable. La salle de petit-déjeuner est lumineuse c'est agréable au réveil. Les chambres en bois ont aussi un certain charme.
review.comment_negative: Un peu sale par endroit et nous avons eu un peu de mal a trouver l'hôtel car il se situe un peu plus haut dans la rue que l'emplacement indiqué par gg maps et booking.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: El hotel está bien, es sencillo, pero está limpio y el desayuno está bien, un bocadillo de tortilla con salsas vietnamitas. Llegamos tarde y nos estaban esperando.
review.comment_negative: La ubicación de google maps esta mal y no encontrábamos el hotel, pero vinieron a buscarnos.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: de vriendelijkheid van de uitbaters, ze deden alle moeite om mij een comfortabel verblijf te geven en hebben een mooie tour van de grotten geregeld
